metadata.inclusion:
1. Hold the control button for 7 seconds until the LED blinks amber.
2. Tap the top rocker 1 time
3. The Status LED will quickly flash green
metadata.exclusion:
1. Hold the control button for 7 seconds until the LED blinks amber.
2. Tap the top rocker 1 time
3. The Status LED will quickly flash green
metadata.reset: Hold the top rocker for 14 seconds. After the first 7 seconds, the Status LED will turn amber, continue holding until the Status LED flashes red/amber then release.
